title: Mystic Chaos
description: Once upon an ordinary life, the impossible didnâ€™t exist. Aria feeds on emotions, controls ice, and a mysterious dead twin. That's pretty normal, right? Her mystical marks happen to be the key to the secrets within magic, and there is a town full of others as well. Each intricate glistening metallic design on their skin is a secret waiting to be unraveled.
author: B.P. Parker
